summary: Reduces the fog distance from most of Purity's weathers to helps to disimulate the ugly lod textures, while maintaining the original mod vision.
descriptionHtml:
[b]1) WHAT DOES THIS MOD DO EXACTLY?[/b]
"Purity - Mist Return" reduces the Distant fog value (both near & far) from the most [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242]PURITY[/url] weathers, to match vanilla levels. The visual result is a more evident dintant fog (see pictures). Those weathers with similar values between vanilla and Purity were not edited...


[b]2) WHY MODIFY PURITY? IT'S GOOD AS IS...[/b]
I made this mod for personal use for two main reasons:

First, I think the fog does a great job creating a cold atmosphere, even on the clearest days, and I like the visual effect it gives.

Second and most important, a closer fog allows to disguise the ugly LOD textures even with mods that help a lot in this aspect (see pics).
I like how [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242]PURITY[/url] transforms skyrim from a grayish thing to a vibrant and colorful world, and best of all, without loss of FPS. However, I also noticed immediately that the ugly LOD textures become more evident (an usual issue of all visuals and enviroments overhauls).

Also, if you have a midrange PC like me, which does not allow you to raise the "Ugridstoload" (cells that the game loads) or install ultra High resolution Lod textures, without your a FPS drops below 30 on wodden areas, maybe this mod may interest you ...

you can also use medium resolution mods to improve the LOD textures like:
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17984]Detailed Terrain and Tree LoD[/url]
-[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77130]LaBeats unobtrusive tree LODs for enb
[/url]
Installation:
Use your favorite Mod Manager and put after "Purity".

Uninstallation:
Just delete the mod with no risks. Just an esp.
